item.title: Project 1 : Customer Purchase Behaviour Study
item.description: Overview We need to understand our customer’s purchase behaviour and rank them on the basis of how much they spend, how frequent they visit and how recent they visited. Research shown: Cohort Analysis Customer Retention Recency Frequency Monetary Model (RFM) EDA Elbow method for Optimum clusters Go to Github source code
